Main pronunciation 主要发音: qí

Other pronunciations 其它发音: qí,jī

Original meaning 本义: Meaning chess. Pieces made of wood.

English senses 英语理解: chess; any game similar to chess

Usage example 用法举例: 棋盤 qí pán (checkerboard)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 2217

Shuowen 说文解字: 博棊從木其聲

棊字的基本解释

棊
qí
同“棋”。

棊字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qí］
［《集韻》渠之切，平之，羣。］
亦作“棊1”。亦作“檱1”。亦作“櫀1”。亦作“簯1”。
(1)一种文娱活动的用具。一副棋包括若干颗棋子和一个棋盘，下棋的人按一定规则摆上并移动棋子，比赛输赢。如围棋、象棋、军棋、跳棋等。古时亦通称博弈的子为棋。
(2)指下棋。
[②]［jī］
［《集韻》居之切，平之，見。］
亦作“檱2”。亦作“櫀2”。
根柢。

棊字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　棊； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页532第02
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】渠之切【正韻】渠宜切，?音其。或作碁、櫀，通作棋。【說文】博棊。【徐曰】棊者，方正之名。古通謂博奕之子爲棊。又【楚辭•招魂】菎蔽象棊，有六簙些。【註】樗蒱馬也。　又【博物志】堯造圍棊，丹朱善之。　又【劉向•說苑】雍周謂孟嘗君曰：足下燕居，鬭象棋，亦戰鬭之事乎。

棊字的源字形

棊字的起名意思

暂无。

棊
Basic explanation of words
棊
qí
Same as "chess".
棊
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qí］
["Ji Yun" Qu Zhi Qi, Ping Zhi, Qun. ]
Also known as "棊1". Also known as "檱1". Also known as "櫀1". Also known as "Zhu 1".
(1) A tool for recreational activities. A chess set consists of a number of chess pieces and a chess board. The chess player places and moves the chess pieces according to certain rules, and the game wins or loses. Such as Go, Chess, Army Chess, Checkers, etc. In ancient times, the pieces of a game were also commonly referred to as chess.
(2) Refers to playing chess.
[②]［jī］
["Jiyun" Juzhi, Pingzhi, see. ]
Also known as "檱2". Also known as "櫀2".
Root.
棊
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　棊; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 532 02
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Qu Zhi cut [Zheng Yun] Qu Yi cut,? Sound it. Or as qi, 櫀, pass as chess. [Speaking] Bodi. [Xu Yue] The name of the founder. Gu Tong said that the son of game is 棊. Also【Ci Songs•Calling the Souls】Shooting the elephants, there are more than six Boss. [Note] Aolangma also.　[Natural History] Yao made a siege, Dan Zhu Shanzhi.　[Liu Xiang•Suo Yuan] Yong Zhou said that Meng Changjun said: Under one step, Yanju, chess and chess, also fight the matter.
